隐私权政策

感谢您使用我们的分布式应用。我们非常重视您的隐私权，并承诺为您提供安全、透明的服务。本隐私权政策说明了我们在收集、使用和处理您的个人信息时所遵循的原则和规定。请您仔细阅读以下内容。

信息的收集和使用

我们的分布式应用可能会收集和使用以下信息：

(1) 设备信息：我们可能会收集您的设备类型、设备标识符、操作系统版本、网络信息等设备相关信息。

(2) 日志信息：当您使用我们的服务时，我们会自动收集您的操作日志和异常日志等信息。

(3) 用户信息：当您使用我们的服务时，我们可能会要求您提供一些个人信息，例如姓名、电子邮件地址等，以便我们提供更好的服务。

(4) 图片信息：如果您使用我们的服务上传图片信息，我们可能会收集和存储这些信息。

信息的处理和存储

我们会采用合理的方式收集、使用和处理您的个人信息，并采取必要的技术措施保护您的个人信息不被丢失、泄露或滥用。我们只会在必要的情况下将您的个人信息传输到服务器，以便为您提供更好的服务。

信息的共享和披露

我们不会将您的个人信息出售、出租或交换给第三方，除非：

(1) 根据法律、法规或政府机构要求；

(2) 为保护我们的合法权益或用户的合法权益；

(3) 您已经同意共享您的个人信息。

在上述情况下，我们会尽合理的努力通知您相关情况。

Cookie 和其他技术

我们可能会使用 Cookie 或其他技术来收集和存储您的信息。Cookie 是一种小型数据文件，存储在您的设备上，以便我们了解您的使用习惯和偏好。您可以通过更改浏览器设置来拒绝 Cookie，但这可能会影响您的使用体验。

年龄限制

我们的服务只适用于 18 岁及以上的成年人。如果您是未满 18 岁的未成年人，请不要使用我们的服务。

隐私权政策的修改

我们可能会不定期修改本隐私权政策，以反映我们在隐私保护方面的最新政策和做法。我们会在本页面上发布更新的政策，建议您定期查阅。

Privacy Policy

Thank you for using our distributed application. We highly value your privacy and are committed to providing you with a secure and transparent service. This Privacy Policy outlines the principles and regulations we follow when collecting, using, and processing your personal information. Please read the following carefully. Collection and Use of Information Our distributed application may collect and use the following information:

(1) Device Information: We may collect information about your device type, device identifier, operating system version, network information, and other device-related information.

(2) Log Information: When you use our service, we automatically collect information such as your operation logs and exception logs.

(3) User Information: When you use our service, we may request you to provide some personal information, such as your name, email address, etc., in order to provide you with better service.

(4) Image Information: If you upload image information using our service, we may collect and store this information.

Processing and Storage of Information We will collect, use, and process your personal information in a reasonable manner and take necessary technical measures to protect your personal information from loss, leakage, or misuse. We will only transmit your personal information to servers when necessary to provide you with better service. Sharing and Disclosure of Information We will not sell, rent, or exchange your personal information with third parties unless:

(1) Required by laws, regulations, or government agencies;

(2) To protect our legitimate interests or the legitimate interests of users;

(3) You have agreed to share your personal information. In the above cases, we will make reasonable efforts to notify you of the relevant situation. Cookies and Other Technologies We may use cookies or other technologies to collect and store your information. Cookies are small data files stored on your device to help us understand your usage habits and preferences. You can refuse cookies by changing your browser settings, but this may affect your user experience.

Age Limitation Our service is only for individuals who are 18 years of age or older. If you are a minor under the age of 18, please do not use our service. Modification of Privacy Policy We may modify this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect our latest policies and practices on privacy protection. We will post updated policies on this page and recommend that you check it regularly.
